def reorder(head):
    if not head or not head.next:
        return head
    slow = fast = head
    while fast.next and fast.next.next:
        slow = slow.next
        fast = fast.next.next
    mid = slow.next
    slow.next = None
    mid = reverse(mid)
    p1 = head
    p2 = mid
    while p2:
        temp1 = p1.next
        temp2 = p2.next
        p1.next = p2
        p2.next = temp1
        p1 = temp1
        p2 = temp2
    return head

def reverse(head):
    prev = None
    curr = head
    while curr:
        next_node = curr.next
        curr.next = prev
        prev = curr
        curr = next_node
    return prev
